subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Copa America (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: In the moments after Brazil’s 1-0 loss to Colombia, Neymar received the card for head-butting an opponent, meaning he will miss his team’s critical group-stage finale on Sunday against Venezuela.
snippet: In the moments after Brazil’s 1-0 loss to Colombia, Neymar received the card for head-butting an opponent, meaning he will miss his team’s critical group-stage finale on Sunday against Venezuela.
